attributes.action: Ban selling fireworks to public. only to be sold to organised event's
attributes.additional_details: Only allow licensed organisations to buy them
attributes.background: I’ve have 2 dogs who are absolutely petrified of fireworks and I know many of thousands if not millions have pets and live stock and the elderly who are petrified of them too.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700013
